Santrex first appeared in 2001, as ConnectPower.net - an answer to the growing web hosting industry. In 2008 ConnectPower was acquired by Santrex.net. We still offer the same quality service we always did, and we can take care of all your needs, from "starter" home user to massive enterprise business. We provide Unix accounts, IRCD shell accounts, web hosting, dedicated servers, reseller plans, domain services, SHOUTcast, torrent hosting, proxy, XDCC hosting, VPS, SSL certificates, and much more.

Our Premium services are fully customized, you can choose the exact amount of RAM, HDD or CPU. Additionally we can adjust the servers up to your demand at any time.

We have brand new IBM servers, new network, and therefore improved performance along with stability, running on Gbit ports and given 200mbit in total for each server instead of 100mbit. Moreover the better support onsite in the datacenter will be provided. In order to achieve optimum performance and to avoid data losses or disk failures hardware raid10 has been added. SAS drives on the new servers implemented instead of SATA assure the best possible performance.

Here at Santrex we always give you a 10 % discount for every time you sign up for a 3 month service, 15% discount for 6 month payments, and finally 20% discount on yearly payments. This offer goes all of our services except dedicated servers!
